messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Good hangman words
messages.msgSnippet: When I play Hangman, I prefer to use phrases... things like quotes from books & songs. The roof is made of bones is one that I ve used a few times. Also la
messages.messageBody:
When I play Hangman, I prefer to use phrases... things like quotes from books
& songs. 'The roof is made of bones' is one that I've used a few times. Also
'la vie boheme', but that one has a lot of vowels, and is pretty short.


> <<
> One of my favorite "hang man" words is "strength." Eight letters and only
> one vowel <ggg> >>
>
> Another good one: joy
>
> Only three letters, two vowels (one odd), an odd consonant.

--Roxana


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Good hangman words
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/20/02 11:34:44 PM, ikonstitcher@cox.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/20/02 11:34:44 PM, ikonstitcher@... writes:

<<
One of my favorite "hang man" words is "strength." Eight letters and only
one vowel <ggg> >>

Another good one: joy

Only three letters, two vowels (one odd), an odd consonant.
